items.sentence: Do you have something you\'d like to tell me?
We need to go out with each other more often.
We need to hire someone who can speak French.
We need to keep getting better at everything.
Tom thought he\'d forgotten to lock the door.
Tom was unable to control himself any longer.
Tom went to the beach with Mary last weekend.
Tom went to the hospital because he was sick.
I don\'t know anything about Tom\'s business.
I\'ll get something to drink for both of you.
I\'ll get you out of this horrible situation.
I\'ll get you the info you need by next week.
I\'ll give these books to whoever wants them.
I\'ll give this apple to anyone who wants it.
I\'ll give you another chance if you want it.
Tom went to the horse races once last summer.
Tom will arrive in Boston tomorrow afternoon.
Tom will be coming back to Boston in October.
Tom must\'ve forgotten what he promised Mary.
Aren\'t you the one who asked Tom to do that?
